init.value: This exercise demonstrates the Same Origin Policy Protection.  XHR requests can only be passed back to  the originating server.  Attempts to pass data to a non-originating server  will fail.
init.raw: This exercise demonstrates the Same Origin Policy Protection.  XHR requests can only be passed back to  the originating server.  Attempts to pass data to a non-originating server  will fail.
